sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3c0da83adb3263003af8cd051496198d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.siAbeHelper</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>siAbeHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var siAbeHelper = Class.create();

siAbeHelper.prototype = {
	
    initialize: function() {
    },

    getGroups: function (portalId, groupId) {

        var portalGr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');

        if (portalId) {
            portalGr.get(portalId);
        } else {
            portalGr.addQuery('default', '1');
            portalGr.query();
            portalGr.next();
            portalId = portalGr.getUniqueValue();
        }

        var sassString = portalGr.getValue('css_variables');

        var sassVars = {};

        if (sassString) {

            var sassMatch = sassString.match(/(\$.+):\s?(.+);/gi);

            sassMatch.forEach(function (cv) {
                var name = cv.slice(0, cv.indexOf(':'));
                sassVars[name] = cv.slice(cv.indexOf(':') + 1, cv.length).replace(';', '').trim();
            });
        }

        var groupGr = new GlideRecord('si_abe_group');
        groupGr.addQuery('portal', portalId);
        groupGr.orderBy('order');
        groupGr.query();

        var groups = [];

        var count = 0;

        while (groupGr.next()) {

            var group = this._buildGroup(groupGr);

            group.selected = group.sysId === groupId || (!groupId && count === 0);

            group.testid = (group.sysId === groupId) + ' ' + typeof group.sysId + ' === ' + typeof groupId;

            var itemGr = new GlideRecord('si_abe_item');
            itemGr.addQuery('group', group.sysId);
            itemGr.orderBy('order');
            itemGr.query();

            var items = [];

            while (itemGr.next()) {

                var item = {
                    name: itemGr.getDisplayValue(),
                    sysId: itemGr.getUniqueValue(),
                    description: itemGr.getValue('description'),
                    order: parseInt(itemGr.getValue('order')),
                    cssSelector: itemGr.getValue('css_selector'),
                    type: itemGr.getValue('type')
                };

                if (itemGr.getRecordClassName() === 'si_abe_item_variable') {

                    item.classType = 'variable';
                    item.sassVariable = itemGr.ref_si_abe_item_variable.sass_variable.toString();
                    item.defaultValue = itemGr.ref_si_abe_item_variable.default_value.toString();
                    item.sassValue = sassVars[item.sassVariable] ? sassVars[item.sassVariable] : false;

                } else if (itemGr.getRecordClassName() === 'si_abe_item_field') {

                    item.classType = 'field';
                    item.table = itemGr.ref_si_abe_item_field.table.toString();
                    item.field = itemGr.ref_si_abe_item_field.field.toString();
                    item.document = itemGr.ref_si_abe_item_field.document.toString();

                    var fieldGr = new GlideRecord(item.table);
                    fieldGr.get(item.document);

                    if (item.type === 'image') {
                        item.value = this._getImage(item.table, item.field, item.document);
                    } else {
                        item.value = fieldGr.getValue(item.field);
                    }
                }

                items.push(item);
            }

            group.items = items;

            if (group.items.length > 0) {
                groups.push(group);
            }

            count++;
        }

        return groups;

    },

    getPortals: function (portalId) {

        var portalGr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
        portalGr.orderBy('default');
        portalGr.query();

        var portals = [];

        while (portalGr.next()) {

            var portal = {
                name: portalGr.getDisplayValue(),
                title: portalGr.getDisplayValue(),
                value: portalGr.getUniqueValue(),
                sysId: portalGr.getUniqueValue(),
                displayValue: portalGr.getDisplayValue(),
                urlSuffix: portalGr.getValue('url_suffix'),
                theme: portalGr.getValue('theme'),
                homepage: portalGr.getDisplayValue("homepage"),
            };

            portal.selected = portal.sysId === portalId || (!portalId && portalGr.getValue('default') === '1');

            var groupGr = new GlideRecord('si_abe_group');
            groupGr.addQuery('portal', portal.sysId);
            groupGr.orderBy('order');
            groupGr.setLimit(1);
            groupGr.query();

            if (groupGr.next()) {
                portal.defaultGroup = this._buildGroup(groupGr)
            }

            portals.push(portal);
        }

        return portals;
    },

    saveSassValue: function saveSassValue(portalId, sassVar, sassVal) {

        var portalGr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
        portalGr.get(portalId);

        var sassString = portalGr.getValue('css_variables') || '';

        var re = new RegExp('(\\' + sassVar + ':)(.*?)(;)');

        if (sassString.indexOf(sassVar) !== -1) {
            sassString = sassString.replace(re, '$1 ' + sassVal + '$3');
        } else {
            sassString = sassString + '\n' + sassVar + ': ' + sassVal + ';';
        }

        portalGr.setValue('css_variables', sassString);
        return portalGr.update();

    },

    saveField: function saveField (table, document, field, value) {

        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        gr.get(document);
        gr.setValue(field, value);
        return gr.update();
    },

    processImage: function processImage (imageId) {

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');

        if(gr.get(imageId)) {

            var tableName = 'ZZ_YY' + gr.getValue('table_name');
            var tableSysId = gr.getValue('table_sys_id');
            var fileName = gr.getValue('file_name');

            gr.setValue('table_name', tableName);
            gr.update();

            var oldGr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
            oldGr.addQuery('table_name', tableName);
            oldGr.addQuery('table_sys_id', tableSysId);
            oldGr.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
            oldGr.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', gr.getUniqueValue());

            gs.cacheFlush()

            return oldGr.deleteMultiple();
        }
    },

    _buildGroup: function (groupGr) {

        return {
            name: groupGr.getDisplayValue(),
            sysId: groupGr.getUniqueValue(),
            annotation: groupGr.getValue('annotation'),
            order: parseInt(groupGr.getValue('order')),
            search: groupGr.getValue('search')
        };
    },

    _getImage: function (table, field, recordId) {

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
        gr.addQuery('table_name', 'ZZ_YY' + table);
        gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', recordId);
        gr.addQuery('file_name', field);
        gr.orderBy('table_name');
        gr.query();

        if (gr.next()) {
            return gr.getUniqueValue() + '.iix';
        }

        return false;
    },

    type: 'siAbeHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-08 03:50:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>3c0da83adb3263003af8cd051496198d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>siAbeHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Advanced Branding Editor" source="4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Advanced Branding Editor">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3c0da83adb3263003af8cd051496198d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dylan.lindgren</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-09 01:46:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ca454d0fdbba63003af8cd0514961964
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>3e9ea87adb3263003af8cd05149619fc</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Save Variable</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var requestBody = request.body;
	var requestData = requestBody.data;
	
	var portalId = requestData.portalId;
	var groupId = requestData.groupId;
	
	var sassVar = requestData.sassVar;
	var sassVal = requestData.sassVal;
	
	var ah = new siAbeHelper();
	
	ah.saveSassValue(portalId, sassVar, sassVal);
	
	response.setBody(ah.getGroups(portalId, groupId));

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/snc/abe/var/save</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/var/save</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-09 00:23:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>ca454d0fdbba63003af8cd0514961964</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Save Variable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Advanced Branding Editor" source="4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Advanced Branding Editor">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ca454d0fdbba63003af8cd0514961964</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-09 00:29:54</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Advanced Branding Editor">9654c10fdbba63003af8cd05149619ab</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
}
.colorpicker-2x .colorpicker-hue, .colorpicker-2x .colorpicker-alpha {
  width: 30px;
  height: 200px;
}
.colorpicker-2x .colorpicker-color, .colorpicker-2x .colorpicker-color div {
  height: 30px;
}</css><name>AbeBSCPStyles</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-08 05:01:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>3dadb076db7263003af8cd05149619f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AbeBSCPStyles</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Advanced Branding Editor" source="4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Advanced Branding Editor">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_3dadb076db7263003af8cd05149619f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-08 05:01:37</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: customc#abe-editor { position: relative; height: 100%; width: 100%; .abe-field-string { input { box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ccc; border-left: 1px solid #eee; border-top: 1px solid #eee; border-radius: 4px; background: white; width: 100%; } } .abe-g-annotation { background-color: #f9f9f9; padding: 10px; font-size: 13px; border-bottom: 1px solid #eeeeee; } .abe-g-closed .panel-heading { border-bottom: 0; border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px; } .ai-head { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; } .ai-h-show { a { cursor: pointer; font-size: 10px; border-bottom: 1px #428bca dotted; margin-right: 3px; &:hover { border-bottom-color: #2a6496; } } } .av-reset { text-align: right; button { position: relative; font-size: 10px; padding: 1px 2px; margin-right:-1px; } } .panel-heading { padding: 0 10px; } .panel-title { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; min-height: 49.6px; div { padding: 10px 0; } button { padding: 5px 10px; border-radius: 4px; background-color: white; border: 1px solid #ddd; cursor: pointer; z-index: 100; } } .panel-body:not(:last-of-type) { border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; } } ul { list-style: none; padding: 10px 0 0 0; margin-bottom: 10px; } li { margin: 0 0 30px 0; font-weight: 300; position: static; &:last-of-type { margin: 0; } } label { margin-bottom: 5px; } input { padding: 5px 10px; border: 0; &:disabled { background-color: white; } } .abe-unit { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ccc; border-left: 1px solid #eee; border-top: 1px solid #eee; border-radius: 4px; background: white; input { flex: 1 1 100%; margin-right: 10px; border-radius: 4px 0 0 4px; background: white; border: 0; width: auto; } select { flex: 0 0 40px; border: 0; padding-left: 3px; border-left: 1px solid #eee; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0; -webkit-appearance: none; -moz-appearance: none; appearance: none; } } .abe-e-container { height: 100%; position: absolute; overflow-x: scroll; overflow-y: visible; width: calc(100% + 10px); padding: 0 15px 0 0; } .abe-cp-color { min-height: 20px; padding: 3px 5px; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0; flex: 0 0 40px; position: relative; margin-right: -1px; border-left: 1px solid #eee; } .abe-image, .abe-field-image { padding: 5px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; background-image: url("/si-abe-image-bg.png"); position: relative; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; .abe-i-instruction { text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: bold; position: absolute; height: 100%; width: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; display: none; justify-content: center; align-items: center; font-size: 30px; color: white; text-shadow: 0 0 1px black; opacity: 0.9; pointer-events: none; } &:hover .abe-i-instruction { display: flex; } input { visibility: hidden; height: 0; width: 0; position: absolute; } img { max-width: 100%; max-height: 200px; } } .abe-cp { display: flex; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 4px; background: white; box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ccc; border: 1px solid #eee; border-bottom-width: 0; position: relative; .abe-cp-popup { position: absolute; width: 100%; right: 0; z-index: 200; top: 100%; .dropdown-menu { left: auto; right: 5px; top: 2px; } } input { border-radius: 4px 0 0 4px; margin: 0; border: 0; padding: 5px 10px; flex: 1 1 100%; } }sp_instancefalsesiabe-editorfalseABE Editorfalsefalsesp_widgetdylan.lindgren@snc2019-01-08 03:58:567d5f24fadb3263003af8cd051496192c8ABE Editor4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd05149619284d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928sp_widget_7d5f24fadb3263003af8cd051496192cdylan.lindgren2019-01-09 03:15:06

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_996ee47adb3263003af8cd05149619b3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>siAbeNg</name><script><![CDATA[var siAbeNg = angular.module('siAbeNg', [])
    .service('NgAbeTransport', function ($rootScope, $http, ngAbeControl) {

        let apiPath = '/api/snc/abe';

        function saveVar(sassVar, sassVal) {

            $rootScope.$broadcast('abe.save.start');

            $http.post(apiPath + '/var/save', {
                portalId: ngAbeControl.getPortal().sysId,
                groupId: ngAbeControl.getGroup().sysId,
                sassVar: sassVar,
                sassVal: sassVal
            }).then(function (r) {
                $rootScope.$broadcast('abe.save.complete');
                ngAbeControl.initGroups(r.data.result);
            });
        }

        function saveField(table, document, field, value) {

            $rootScope.$broadcast('abe.save.start');

            $http.post(apiPath + '/field/save', {
                portalId: ngAbeControl.getPortal().sysId,
                groupId: ngAbeControl.getGroup().sysId,
                table: table,
                document: document,
                field: field,
                value: value
            }).then(function (r) {
                $rootScope.$broadcast('abe.save.complete');
            });
        }

        function saveImage(image, table, document, field) {

            $rootScope.$broadcast('abe.save.start');

            let request = $http({
                method: 'POST',
                url: '/api/now/attachment/file',
                params: {
                    'table_sys_id': document,
                    'table_name' : table,
                    'file_name': field
                },
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': image.type
                },
                data: image
            });

            request.then(function (r) {
                $http({
                    method: 'POST',
                    url: apiPath + '/image/' + r.data.result.sys_id + '/process'
                }).then(function () {
                    $rootScope.$broadcast('abe.save.complete');
                });
            });

            return request;
        }

        return {
            saveImage: saveImage,
            saveVar: saveVar,
            saveField: saveField
        };
    })
    .service('ngAbeControl', function ($location) {

        let portalWatchers = [];
        let groupWatchers = [];


        let portals = false;
        let groups = false;
        let portal = false;
        let group = false;

        if ($location.search().spa !== '1') {
            $location.search('spa', 1)
        }

        function getPortal() {
            return portal;
        }

        function getPortals() {
            return portals;
        }

        function isInit() {
            return groups && groups && portals && portal;
        }

        function initPortals(p) {

            portals = p;

            portals.find(function (cv) {
                if (cv.selected) {
                    setPortal(cv);
                }
            });
        }

        function initGroups(g) {

            groups = g;

            group = groups.find(function (cv) {
                return cv.selected;
            });
        }

        function getGroups() {
            return groups;
        }

        function setPortal(p) {

            portal = p;

            if ($location.search().sys_id !== portal.sysId) {

                $location.search('sys_id', portal.sysId);

                if (p.defaultGroup) {
                    group = p.defaultGroup;
                    $location.search('group_id', group.sysId);
                } else {
                    $location.search('group_id', null);
                }

                portalWatchers.forEach(function (cv) {
                    cv(portal);
                });
            }
        }

        function setGroup(g) {

            groups.forEach(function (cv) {
                cv.selected = g.sysId === cv.sysId;
            });

            group = g;

            $location.search('group_id', group.sysId);

            groupWatchers.forEach(function (cv) {
                cv(group);
            });
        }

        function getGroup() {
            return group;
        }

        function setPortalWatcher(func) {
            portalWatchers.push(func);
        }

        function setGroupWatcher(func) {
            groupWatchers.push(func);
        }

        return {
            isInit: isInit,
            setPortal: setPortal,
            setGroup: setGroup,
            getGroup: getGroup,
            setPortalWatcher: setPortalWatcher,
            setGroupWatcher: setGroupWatcher,
            getPortal: getPortal,
            getPortals: getPortals,
            initPortals: initPortals,
            initGroups: initGroups,
            getGroups: getGroups
        };

    })
    .service('ngAbeHighlighter', function () {

        var func;

        function init(f) {
            func = f;
        }

        function activate(selector) {
            return func(selector);
        }

        return {
            activate: activate,
            init: init
        };
    })
    .directive('ngAbeItem', function ngAbeItem (ngAbeHighlighter) {

        let cancelHighlight;

        function ngAbeItemLink (scope) {

            scope.highlightOn = function () {
                cancelHighlight = ngAbeHighlighter.activate(scope.item.cssSelector);
            };

            scope.highlightOff = function () {
                cancelHighlight ? cancelHighlight() : null;
            };
        }

        function ngAbeItemCtrl ($scope) {

            let c = this;

            $scope.value = $scope.item.value;

            c.value = $scope.item.sassValue || $scope.item.value || $scope.item.defaultValue;
            c.default = $scope.item.defaultValue;

            c.resetProcessor = function (val) {
                return val;
            };

            c.saveProcessor = function (val) {
                return val;
            };

            $scope.reset = function () {
                c.value = c.resetProcessor(c.default);
                $scope.save(c.value);
            };

            $scope.save = function (val) {
                c.value = c.saveProcessor(val);
            };

            $scope.valIsDefault = function () {
                return c.value === c.default;
            }
        }

        return {
            scope: {
                item: '=aiItem'
            },
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-item',
            link: ngAbeItemLink,
            controller: ngAbeItemCtrl
        };
    })
    .directive('ngAbeField', function ngAbeField (NgAbeTransport) {

        function ngAbeFieldLink (scope, elem, attr, ctrl) {
            ctrl.saveProcessor = scope.saveProcessor;
        }

        function ngAbeFieldCtrl ($scope) {

            $scope.saveProcessor = saveProcessor;

            let document = $scope.item.document;
            let table = $scope.item.table;
            let field = $scope.item.field;

            function saveProcessor (val) {
                NgAbeTransport.saveField(table, document, field, val);
            }

            $scope.value = $scope.item.value;
        }

        return {
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-field',
            require: '^^ngAbeItem',
            controller: ngAbeFieldCtrl,
            link: ngAbeFieldLink
        };
    })
    .directive('ngAbeFieldString', function ngAbeFieldString () {

        function ngAbeFieldStringLink (scope, elem, attr, ctrl) {

        }

        function ngAbeFieldStringCtrl ($scope) {

            $scope.stageValue = $scope.value;

            $scope.blur = function () {
                if ($scope.stageValue !== $scope.value) {
                    $scope.save($scope.stageValue);
                }
            };
        }

        return {
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-field-string',
            require: ['^^ngAbeItem', '^^ngAbeField'],
            controller: ngAbeFieldStringCtrl,
            link: ngAbeFieldStringLink
        };

    })
    .directive('ngAbeFieldImage', function ngAbeFieldImage ($http, $rootScope, NgAbeTransport) {

        function ngAbeFieldImageLink (scope, elem, attr, ctrl) {

            scope.trigger = trigger;
            scope.change = change;

            let table = scope.item.table;
            let document = scope.item.document;
            let field = scope.item.field;

            function change(files) {
                NgAbeTransport.saveImage(files[0], table, document, field).then(function (r) {
                    scope.stageValue = r.data.result.sys_id + '.iix';
                });
            }

            function trigger() {
                elem.find('#uploadElem').click();
            }

            ctrl[0].saveProcessor = function () {
                return null;
            };
        }

        function ngAbeFieldImageCtrl ($scope) {
            $scope.stageValue = $scope.value;

            $scope.change = function () {
                $scope.save($scope.stageValue);
            };
        }

        return {
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-field-image',
            require: ['^^ngAbeItem', '^^ngAbeField'],
            controller: ngAbeFieldImageCtrl,
            link: ngAbeFieldImageLink
        };
    })
    .directive('ngAbeVariable', function ngAbeVariable (NgAbeTransport) {

        function ngAbeVariableLink (scope, elem, attr, ctrl) {
            ctrl.saveProcessor = scope.saveProcessor;
        }

        function ngAbeVariableCtrl ($scope) {

            let c = this;

            c.saveProcessor = saveProcessor;
            $scope.saveProcessor = saveProcessor;

            function saveProcessor (val) {
                NgAbeTransport.saveVar($scope.item.sassVariable, val);
            }
        }

        return {
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-variable',
            require: '^^ngAbeItem',
            controller: ngAbeVariableCtrl,
            link: ngAbeVariableLink
        };
    })
    .directive('ngAbeVariableColor', function ngAbeVariableColor($rootScope) {

        function ngAbeVariableColorCtrl () {

        }

        function ngAbeVariableColorLink(scope, elem, attr, ctrl) {

            scope.stageValue = ctrl[0].value;

            ctrl[0].resetProcessor = function resetProcessor (val) {
                scope.stageValue = val;
                return val;
            };

            let input = elem.find('.abe-cp input');
            let popup = elem.find('.abe-cp-popup');
            let field = elem[0];

            let options = {
                customClass: 'colorpicker-2x',
                color: scope.stageValue,
                container: popup,
                sliders: {
                    colorSelectors: {},
                    saturation: {
                        maxLeft: 200,
                        maxTop: 200
                    },
                    hue: {
                        maxTop: 200
                    },
                    alpha: {
                        maxTop: 200
                    }
                }
            };

            input.colorpicker(options).on('hidePicker', function (e) {
                scope.$apply(function () {
                    document.removeEventListener('click', blurIfOutsideField);
                    if (ctrl[0].value !== scope.stageValue) {
                        scope.save(scope.stageValue);
                    }
                });
            }).on('showPicker', function (e) {
                document.addEventListener('click', blurIfOutsideField);
            });

            $rootScope.$on('$locationChangeStart', function () {
                document.removeEventListener('click', blurIfOutsideField);
            });

            function blurIfOutsideField(e) {
                if (!field.contains(e.target) || typeof e === 'undefined') {
                    input.colorpicker('hide');
                }
            }

            scope.open = function () {
                input.colorpicker('show');
            };
        }

        return {
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-variable-color',
            require: ['^^ngAbeItem', '^^ngAbeVariable'],
            link: ngAbeVariableColorLink,
            controller: ngAbeVariableColorCtrl
        };
    })
    .directive('ngAbeVariableImage', function ngAbeVariableImage($http) {

        function ngAbeVariableImageCtrl () {}

        function ngAbeVariableImageLink(scope, elem, attr, ctrl) {

            ctrl[0].value = ctrl[0].value.replace(/['"]+/g, '');

            scope.stageValue = ctrl[0].value;

            ctrl[0].saveProcessor = function (val) {
                ctrl[1].saveProcessor("'" + val + "'");
            };

            scope.trigger = trigger;
            scope.change = change;

            function change(files) {

                let ext = '.' + files[0].name.split('.').pop();
                let name = scope.item.sassVariable + '-' + Date.now() + ext;

                $http({
                    method: 'POST',
                    url: '/api/now/table/db_image',
                    data: {
                        'name': name
                    }
                }).then(function (r) {

                    let sysId = r.data.result.sys_id;

                    $http({
                        method: 'POST',
                        url: '/api/now/attachment/file',
                        params: {
                            'table_name': 'db_image',
                            'file_name': 'image',
                            'table_sys_id': sysId
                        },
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': files[0].type
                        },
                        data: files[0]
                    }).then(function () {
                        scope.save(name);
                        scope.stageValue = name;
                    });

                });

            }

            function trigger() {
                elem.find('#uploadElem').click();
            }
        }

        return {
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-variable-image',
            require: ['^^ngAbeItem', '^^ngAbeVariable'],
            link: ngAbeVariableImageLink,
            controller: ngAbeVariableImageCtrl
        };
    })
    .directive('ngAbeVariableUnit', function ngAbeVariableUnit() {

        function ngAbeVariableUnitLink (scope, elem, attr, ctrl) {
            ctrl[0].resetProcessor = function resetProcessor (val) {
                scope.stageValue = parseUnit(val);
                return val;
            };

            scope.stageValue = parseUnit(ctrl[0].value);
        }

        function ngAbeVariableUnitCtrl ($scope) {

            $scope.units = ['px', 'em', 'vh', 'rem'];

            $scope.change = function () {
                let val = $scope.stageValue.value + $scope.stageValue.unit;
                $scope.save(val);
            };
        }

        function parseUnit(val) {
            let re = /(?:([\d\.]*)(\D*))/g;
            let match = re.exec(val);

            return {
                value: match[1],
                unit: match[2]
            };
        }

        return {
            templateUrl: 'si-abe-variable-unit',
            require: ['^^ngAbeItem', '^^ngAbeVariable'],
            link: ngAbeVariableUnitLink,
            controller: ngAbeVariableUnitCtrl
        };
    });]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-08 03:55:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>996ee47adb3263003af8cd05149619b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>siAbeNg</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Advanced Branding Editor" source="4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Advanced Branding Editor">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_996ee47adb3263003af8cd05149619b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dylan.lindgren</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-09 03:21:51</sys_updated_on><ui_type>1</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_57b74d0fdbba63003af8cd05149619b4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>3e9ea87adb3263003af8cd05149619fc</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Save Field</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var requestBody = request.body;
	var requestData = requestBody.data;
	
	var portalId = requestData.portalId;
	var groupId = requestData.groupId;
	
	var table = requestData.table;
	var document = requestData.document;
	var field = requestData.field;
	var value = requestData.value;
	
	var ah = new siAbeHelper();
	
	ah.saveField(table, document, field, value);
	
	response.setBody(ah.getGroups(portalId, groupId));

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/snc/abe/field/save</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/field/save</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-09 00:24:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>57b74d0fdbba63003af8cd05149619b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Save Field</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Advanced Branding Editor" source="4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Advanced Branding Editor">4d3b6cb6db3263003af8cd0514961928</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_57b74d0fdbba63003af8cd05149619b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dylan.lindgren@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-09 00:29:51</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Advanced Branding Editor">9654c10fdbba63003af8cd05149619ab</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
